title: Rider at the Gate
description: Rider at the Gate (Nighthorse, Book 1)Stranded on a distant planet that abounds with fertile farmland, human colonists appear to be in paradise. But all the native animals communicate by telepathy, projecting images that drive humans mad. Only Nighthorses stand between civilization and madness. When a flare of human emotion spreads to all the horses, chaos erupts.
author: C.J. Cherryh
